seagrassSpecies: Thalassia testudinum, Halodule wrightii, Syringodium filiforme

Notes: Band of eelgrass is relatively narrow (constricted by deep channel). Bed width = 6 m average. Morro Bay has experienced a 97% decline in eelgrass over the last decade.
I also have additional density and canopy height metrics from a False Bay this summer, if that would be useful.
This is typical for AK eelgrass in the low intertidal. Highish shoot density, but lover cover because blades are narrow.
